thread.title: Charlotte Francis
thread.title_full: Giant Vintage Sunglasses reviewed by Charlotte Francis

author: Charlotte Francis
title: Charlotte Francis
text: would have got 5 stars, but one of the pairs of glasses i order smells of cheese and i can't make the smell go away lol. But otherwise, amazing service. Ordered from the UK and glasses got here within a week with cute lil sweets and stickers too. Definitely recommend and will be ordering more in future
